title: Albertsons Launches Strategic Review; The parent company of grocery chains Safeway and Jewel-Osco went public in 2020
text:
It said it has retained bankers from Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and Credit Suisse Group AG to assist in the review. It added that it hasn't set a timetable for the review.

The parent company of grocery chains Safeway and Jewel-Osco went public in 2020. It operates more than 2,270 in 34 states.

Shares rose 9.4% in after-hours trading. The stock closed Monday at $29.15 a share, down 1.9%. Shares are up 80% over the last 12 months.

Write to Robert Barba at Robert.Barba@wsj.com

Albertsons Launches Strategic Review
